name: The Raincoat Man
description:
The Raincoat Man is a third person horror game. Through the years the legend of the raincoat man haunted the Rocksfield City and now he is back to catch you. Be aware, he is always looking for you.  There is something foul happening in the Rocksfield City. There are monsters everywhere and you can't hide forever.

  • Dive into the dark world of The Raincoat Man to unravel horrific mysteries.
  • Solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of the family Dudley and the whereabouts of your friend, Happy.
  • Use your best skills and creative to outwit your enemies.

Follow me on Twitter to keep update about the game

Details about the demo:
  • Lenght: 30 min
  • Language: English, Portuguese, Spanish, German and Turkish 
  • Developer: Gundes
  • There is a MediaKit zip folder where you can find screenshots, logo PNG and character render PNG if you want to make a video about it! 

Note: if you have previously played 'House of Memories' before, this is a new version with a brand new title. Is worth to play again since basically everything changed except for the cutscene.
